name: Pace Ghost Pepper Habanero Extra Hot Salsa, 16 oz Jar
short_description: One (1) 16 oz Jar of Pace Ghost Pepper Habanero Extra Hot Salsa
Pace is a thick and chunky salsa made with jalapenos and tomatoes picked at the peak of freshness
Turn up the heat with our extra hot salsa, a fiery blend of ghost peppers and habaneros
Level-up your weeknight meals with a hit of flavor or pair with tortilla chips for your next game day party food
Gluten free and made with no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
product_description: Unleash the flavor with Pace Medium Picante Sauce, the ultimate thrill for salsa lovers. With over 75 years of legendary flavor, Pace is the trusted, iconic brand that brings authentic zest to your table. This medium picante sauce is packed with vine-ripened tomatoes and hand-picked jalapenos, making it the perfect flavor enhancer for any food aficionado. Whether you're gearing up for Cinco De Mayo, celebrating Taco Tuesday, or enjoying some patio moments, this sauce is your go-to for adding an exciting flavor kick to any occasion. Game day? Liven up your tailgating spread with this delicious dip. Summer grilling? Use it as a marinade to kick-up your BBQ game. From topping your nachos to drizzling over tacos, this sauce is an adventurous addition to any meal. Pace Medium Picante Sauce is not just a dip; it's an experience. Pair it with tortilla chips for a snack that delights, or use it to elevate your Mexican food to the next level. Every jar promises a burst of flavor that will leave your taste buds tingling and your guests coming back for more. So, why wait? Pick up the Pace and let every meal be an adventure with this flavorful sauce. It's time to dip, drizzle, and devour with Pace Medium Picante Sauce. Savor the flavor, love the taste.

name: Desert Pepper Spicy Black Bean Dip with Black Beans, Jalapeno Peppers and Fresh Vegetables, Gluten-Free, Low Carb Snack 16 oz, 6-Pack
short_description: BLACK BEAN DIP: Black beans, tomatoes, sweet green peppers, chipotles & jalapenos harmonize in this spicy Black Bean Dip. Great with fish, nachos & fajitas. Throw caution to the wind and dip in!
PERFECT TO PAIR: Black Bean Dip pairs with chicken, pork or chips for a delicious snack or meal. Savor the rich blend & luscious heat. Serve alongside guacamole, tortilla chips & hummus.

PREMIUM INGREDIENTS: We use the freshest vegetables picked at just the right time to create award-winning salsas. Chiles, cilantro, tomatoes, red pepper, black beans, yellow corn, onions & garlic create all-natural, vegetarian & gluten-free dips.
CLASSIC TASTE: Desert Pepper takes pride in bringing you a tasty range of salsas, condiments, bean dips & queso to spice up every bite. Grab a margarita and enjoy!

DESERT PEPPER: This multi-generational family business was born & raised on the border of Texas, Mexico & New Mexico. This amazing crux of bright flavors, sunlight & the desert Southwest inspires us in every way.

Stonewall Kitchen Family of Brands: Our award winning line of gourmet food, home goods, and gifts are loved around the world. Featuring brands such as Legal Sea Foods, Michel Design Works, Montebello, Napa Valley Naturals, Stonewall Home, Stonewall Kitchen, Urban Accents, Vermont Coffee Company, Vermont Village, and Village Candle

About Us: It all started in 1991 at a local farmers' market with a few dozen items that we'd finished hand-labeling only hours before. Fast-forward to today and Stonewall Kitchen is now home to an ever-growing family of like-minded lifestyle brands! Expertly made with premium ingredients, our products are the result of decades spent dreaming up, testing and producing only the very best in specialty foods and fine home living.
